MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in Baird Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers are on site and in order to complete a repair due to a fault on our underground cable network, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.09AM on 24th February 2021.
